bibl.title: The Wider Meaning of Psyche in Pindar and Bacchylides.
bibl.note: Examines the 24 instances of psyche in Pindar and Bacchylides. The range of meaning and the ways in which psyche differs from and is similar to Homer's use of the term.
bibl.seg: SULLIVAN Shirley Darcus, The Wider Meaning of Psyche in Pindar and Bacchylides.
Examines the 24 instances of psyche in Pindar and Bacchylides. The range of meaning and the ways in which psyche differs from and is similar to Homer's use of the term.
